title: Are Bill Gates and the ID2020 Coalition Using COVID-19 To Build Global Surveillance State?
subtitle: Conspiracy theorists misrepresent Bill Gates’ funding of vaccination and digital-identity research as evidence of a nefarious global surveillance plan foretold in the Book of Revelation.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Bill Gates —  along with a coalition dubbed "ID 2020" — seeks to "microchip" the world population using a COVID-19 vaccine.
